meanings.sent1: The wateriest soup I ever tasted was like drinking a whole river!
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the ground was at its wateriest state.
meanings.sent3: The wateriest juice I made was so thin, it was practically just colored water.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were the wateriest blue, like looking into the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The wateriest part of the sponge soaked up all the liquid in seconds.

meanings.sent1: The wateriest fruits are usually the most refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The wateriest melon was so juicy that it dripped down my chin.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the wateriest plants in her garden were the ones she forgot to water.
meanings.sent4: The wateriest clouds in the sky promised a heavy rainstorm.
meanings.sent5: The wateriest cotton shirt absorbed sweat like a sponge.

meanings.definition: Diluted with water to the greatest extent.
meanings.sent1: The wateriest lemonade was so weak, it barely tasted like lemons.
meanings.sent2: The wateriest paint color looked almost transparent on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally made the wateriest coffee by forgetting to put coffee grounds.
meanings.sent4: The wateriest ink in the pen made the writing look faded and pale.
meanings.sent5: The wateriest soup in the cafeteria was more like colored water with a hint of flavor.
